name: Blossom Blitz Tropic
description:
Join the match-3 tropic fun with this awesome new puzzle game!
Play the addicting Blossom Blitz Tropic game for free and spend a relaxing day at the exotic island. Swap and match the beautiful flowers and explore hundreds of colorful levels filled with amazing graphics and visual effects.


Link the flowers and match your way through absolutely gorgeous levels, unlock splendid boosters and clear the board from all the flower buds!

• Make rows of at least 3 flowers to remove them and clear the board.
• Collect the flowers and win levels.
• Enjoy hundreds of colorful levels.
• Plan your moves and solve all the fun puzzles.
• Make powerful combinations to create big explosions!
• Complete the missions set at the beginning of each new level.

++ Boost your experience with awesome power-ups:
- Match 4 flowers to get a horizontal or vertical item of this kind that will create a line blast.
- Connect 5 flower buds in an L or T form to get a powerful boost that will explode all the items around it.
- Match 5 beautiful flowers in a line to get a special colorful bomb that can explode all the figures with the same color.
- Combine 2 special boosts for even greater explosions!
Blossom Blitz Tropic Features:
* Fun puzzles and challenges.
* Lots of exciting levels.
* Awesome boosters and bonuses.
* Easy and fun to learn.
* Free to play!

Start the amazing adventure today!
Move and link 3 flowers of the same color to burst and clear the board, complete all the challenges and attempt to get 3 stars on every level. Plan ahead and work out a strategy to reach high scores by using fewer moves.

Earn and unlock powerful boosts that will help you blast your way through challenging levels, but try not to use the special boosts right away but save your power-ups until you need them.

Don’t wait any longer to join the flower smashing fun! Play now, link 3 beautiful buds, create amazing combinations and win levels.
THANKS for playing!
